Literature.Title: Mono-substitution effects on antimicrobial activity of stapled heptapeptides.
Literature.Author: Luong HX, Kim DH, Mai NT, Lee BJ, Kim YW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2.5% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:1.3% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=18.8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=50µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=18.8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=18.8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
